titleStmt.title: Newes from Niniue to Englande, brought by the prophete Ionas vvhich newes in plainlye published in the godly and learned exposition of Maister Iohn Brentius folovving, translated out of Latine into Englishe by Thomas Tymme minister.
titleStmt.author: Brenz, Johannes, 1499-1570.
Tymme, Thomas, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Pater noster rowe, at the signe of the starre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pater noster rowe, at the signe of the starre
